description: Part single part two storey side extension (following the demolition of the existing garage); two storey rear extension; hip to gable roof conversion and rear roof extension (involving the conversion of roofspace into habitable us); installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 2939 01/MT (ex floor plans and elevations), 2939 02/MT (prop ground floor plan), 2939 03/MT (prop first floor plan), 2939 04/MT (prop loft plan), 2939 05/MT Rev B (prop elevations), 2939 06/MT Rev A (location and block plans).   Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials and those as described on the plans.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(h), and 1.2(g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (Consolidated 2015). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7A, Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (consolidated 2015).
